event.title: died here at the Fanthorp Inn, in 1845

data.event: The town is named for Kenneth Lewis Anderson, a vice-president of the Republic of Texas who died here at the Fanthorp Inn, in 1845.

event.title: served as Mayor of Anderson from 2004

data.event: The honorable Mrs. Gayle Sowell served as Mayor of Anderson from 2004 until present.
